name: Obama Vs Devil Chickens
description:
Click or tap to shoot at the undead chickens or reload... when you have collected enough coins more guns will be available. When Joe Biden is available see what happens!

Version 1.22

High Score works

Twitter button so you can tweet your High Score

Working on Clear HS button but not there yet.


Version 1.21

Working on high score (it's a bit buggy so leaving it out for now)

Fixed bug where flamethrower multiple counted coin hits

Version 1.2

Added Pause to menu

Player can continue previous game

Added new bonuses if you activate Joe Biden!

Fixed a couple of bugs
